content: k3 repeat from * to last two stitches p1 k1 round 2 *k1 p1 repeat from * repeat body rnds 1-2 until your hat measures 8 inches from the cast on edge 10 inches for folded brim end after a round 1 note if you would like a more fitted beanie work to 7 inches for short brim version or 9 inches for finish folded brim cut 10 inch tail draw yarn through the remaining stitches twice and cinch closed crown weave in ends round 1 *k1 p2tog p1 repeat from * 30 33 enjoy your new hat sts round 2 knit across round 3 *k1 p2tog repeat from * 20 22 sts round 4 knit across round 5 *ssk repeat from * 10 11 sts round 6 *k2tog repeat from * for size l one stitch will remain knit this stitch 5 6 sts u r c h i n - v e r s 3 1 p a g e 4 about the designer hi my name is saysha i love everything about the craft of knitting the beautiful yarn welcoming community and endless opportunities for learning i came to design out of a desire to create something i wanted in my own wardrobe and it has become my latest form of creative expression you can find my designs on ravelry the knitrino app and several magazine and book publications keep in touch by connecting with me on social media i am @insayshable knits on instagram and insayshable on ravelry when sharing pictures of your projects use #insayshableknitsdesigns and #urchinhat support + policies all rights reserved © saysha greene 2018 patterns do not distribute copy or resell the pattern if you wish to teach a class using one of my patterns please purchase a copy per student finished objects once you have purchased the pattern you can sell your finished objects but please give credit to insayshable knits by linking back to my ravelry and instagram ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/saysha-greene instagram https //www instagram com/insayshable knits for pattern support please contact me at insayshableknits@gmail com u r c h i n - v e r s 3 1 p a g e 5
